00023 #include <l4/re/namespace>
00024 #include <l4/re/namespace-sys.h>
00025 #include <l4/re/protocols>
00026 
00027 #include <l4/util/util.h>
00028 
00029 #include <l4/cxx/exceptions>
00030 #include <l4/cxx/ipc_helper>
00031 #include <l4/cxx/ipc_stream>
00032 
00033 #include <l4/sys/err.h>
00034 
00035 #include <cstring>
00036 
00037 namespace L4Re {
00038 
00039 long
00040 Namespace::_query(char const *name, unsigned len,
00041                   L4::Cap<void> const &target,
00042                   l4_umword_t *local_id, bool iterate) const throw()
00043 {
00044   unsigned long res = len;
00045   char const *n = name;
00046   L4::Cap<Namespace> ns(cap());
00047   while (res > 0)
00048     {
00049       L4::Ipc::Iostream io(l4_utcb());
00050       io << L4::Opcode(L4Re::Namespace_::Query)
00051          << L4::Ipc::Buf_cp_out<const char>(n, res);
00052       io << L4::Ipc::Small_buf(target.cap(), local_id ? L4_RCV_ITEM_LOCAL_ID : 0);
00053       l4_msgtag_t r = io.call(ns.cap(), L4Re::Protocol::Namespace);
00054       long err = l4_error(r);
00055 
00056       if (err < 0)
00057   return err;
00058 
00059       bool const partly = err & Partly_resolved;
00060       if (partly)
00061   {
00062     l4_umword_t dummy;
00063     io >> dummy >> L4::Ipc::Buf_in<char const>(n, res);
00064   }
00065 
00066       L4::Ipc::Snd_fpage cap;
00067       io >> cap;
00068       if (cap.id_received())
00069   {
00070     *local_id = cap.data();
00071     return res;
00072   }
00073 
00074       if (partly && iterate)
00075   ns = L4::cap_cast<Namespace>(target);
00076       else
00077   return err;
00078     }
00079 
00080   return res;
00081 }
00082 
00083 long
00084 Namespace::query(char const *name, unsigned len, L4::Cap<void> const &target,
00085                  int timeout, l4_umword_t *local_id, bool iterate) const throw()
00086 {
00087   long ret;
00088   long rem = timeout;
00089   long to = 0;
00090 
00091   if (rem)
00092     to = 10;
00093   do
00094     {
00095       ret = _query(name, len, target, local_id, iterate);
00096 
00097       if (ret >= 0)
00098   return ret;
00099 
00100       if (EXPECT_FALSE(ret < 0 && (ret != -L4_EAGAIN)))
00101   return ret;
00102 
00103       if (rem == to)
00104   return ret;
00105 
00106       l4_sleep(to);
00107 
00108       rem -= to;
00109       if (to < 100)
00110   to += to;
00111       if (to > rem)
00112   to = rem;
00113     }
00114   while (486);
00115 }
00116 
00117 long
00118 Namespace::query(char const *name, L4::Cap<void> const &target,
00119                  int timeout, l4_umword_t *local_id,
00120                  bool iterate) const throw()
00121 { return query(name, strlen(name), target, timeout, local_id, iterate); }
00122 
00123 long
00124 Namespace::register_obj(char const *name, L4::Cap<void> const &o,
00125                         unsigned flags) const throw()
00126 {
00127   L4::Ipc::Iostream io(l4_utcb());
00128   io << L4::Opcode(L4Re::Namespace_::Register)
00129      << flags << L4::Ipc::Buf_cp_out<char const>(name, strlen(name));
00130   if (o.is_valid())
00131     io << L4::Ipc::Snd_fpage(o.fpage(L4_FPAGE_RWX & flags));
00132   l4_msgtag_t res = io.call(cap(), L4Re::Protocol::Namespace);
00133   return l4_error(res);
00134 }
00135 
00136 long
00137 Namespace::unlink(char const *name) throw()
00138 {
00139   L4::Ipc::Iostream io(l4_utcb());
00140   io << L4::Opcode(L4Re::Namespace_::Unlink)
00141      << L4::Ipc::Buf_cp_out<char const>(name, strlen(name));
00142   l4_msgtag_t res = io.call(cap(), L4Re::Protocol::Namespace);
00143   return l4_error(res);
00144 }
00145 
00146 long
00147 Namespace::link(char const *name, unsigned len,
00148                 L4::Cap<L4Re::Namespace> src_dir,
00149                 char const *src_name, unsigned src_len,
00150                 unsigned flags) throw()
00151 {
00152   L4::Ipc::Iostream io(l4_utcb());
00153   io << L4::Opcode(L4Re::Namespace_::Link)
00154      << flags << L4::Ipc::Buf_cp_out<char const>(name, len)
00155      << L4::Ipc::Buf_cp_out<char const>(src_name, src_len)
00156      << L4::Ipc::Snd_fpage(src_dir.fpage());
00157   l4_msgtag_t res = io.call(cap(), L4Re::Protocol::Namespace);
00158   return l4_error(res);
00159 }
00160 
00161 };
